name: Sinking Beyond
description:
Let the dreams sink in... You awake in a dream state,  trapped in a seemingly endless water plain, floating above your apartment. Use your dream orb to complete tasks, saving yourself time in the morning.  Don't take too long though, your alarm will go off in 5 minutes and pull you out of the dream. How to play WASD - Movement SHIFT - Sprint SPACE - Jump F - Toggle Dream Orb Left Mouse Click - Descend Dream Orb  Right Mouse Click - Ascend Dream Orb  E - Grab and Drop objects Credits Developers  Bryce (SandboxGames) - UI and Marketing Kevin (setearakevinom) - Programming  Luke (lukafice) - Programming  Leo (raidR) - Level Design and Audio  Lachlan (thef1ip)- Visual Effects and Audio Game Assets and Packs
